c098e143dbaaa15a48a9f79b11afbd71.title: How a Second-Round Unicorn and a 13-Year Vet Saved Denver’s Season

0b6a6aa9ac97ebc0f15999820e7ac6bd.title: How a Second-Round Unicorn and a 13-Year Vet Saved Denver’s Season

7973075212bc.bio: Top Medium writer in sports, TV, humor, NFL, NBA. Words at Cauldron, 16 Wins Ring, Sports Pickle, Bleacher Report, Hoop NBA, and others @wheatonbrando
7973075212bc.name: Brandon Anderson

30d377017bbe.bio: Does not respond well to being told what punk is.
30d377017bbe.name: Zachary Morgason

paragraphs.name: 9c22
paragraphs.text: The Nuggets are creeping. Crawling. Inching along on their bellies and forearms. They might as well wear ghillie suits these days instead of uniforms. They’ve been underestimated for much of the season, but here they are pressed up against the postseason. They won’t win it all, of course. They might even miss the playoffs altogether if they crater and Portland cruises. But given the various preseason expectations — the predictions were all over the place, ranging from back of the NBA pack and Northwest Division afterthought, to somewhere around .500, to a coin flip to make the postseason — the mere fact that we’re discussing the Nuggets and the playoffs in late March is itself a signal of success.

b0700ffafcfb.title: Sounds like Jokic became a star and household name in mid-December 2016, but that Knicks gif is…

paragraphs.name: 157e
paragraphs.text: Sounds like Jokic became a star and household name in mid-December 2016, but that Knicks gif is from the ‘15–16 season. Jokic was pretty good last year too.

4e65bb8847ca.title: Strange how this team is so inefficient on the defensive end considering Mike Malone’s emphasis on…

paragraphs.name: 35e1
paragraphs.text: Strange how this team is so inefficient on the defensive end considering Mike Malone’s emphasis on defense, but I suppose that’s something that gets buy in over time. If that happens this team could be something special. Fun to watch, skilled and tough nosed. Now Kroenke needs to do the same in North London…

61ee086fb2a0.title: Can we stop with the Unicorn stuff already?

paragraphs.name: 41a1
paragraphs.text: Can we stop with the Unicorn stuff already? There can’t be 17 different unicorns. We need to find another metaphor. Players are unique, we get it.

6300bfb893e5.title: A true unicorn is a writer who uses the term “ghillie suits.”

29425da9046a.title: The term ‘Unicorn’ is so overused now, that it’s lost its true meaning.

paragraphs.name: 5ba5
paragraphs.text: The term ‘Unicorn’ is so overused now, that it’s lost its true meaning. Not everyone is a unicorn. Some players are just really good.

ca50895dfb60.title: Can you guys write a single fucking NBA article without “unicorn” in the title… jesus christ

paragraphs.text: Can you guys write a single fucking NBA article without “unicorn” in the title… jesus christ

cec92d47496.title: Great article, its refreshing to see the Nuggets back in the national press coverage.

paragraphs.text: Great article, its refreshing to see the Nuggets back in the national press coverage. Jokic is the impetus for the chatter, but I think in the coming years this team will be in a place to fight the Jazz for one of the top 4 seeds in the West (after the Clippers inevitable collapse). Everywhere you look this team is full of young talent and potential…
